main: ^It looks like you hit your head pretty bad, you look like you don't even remember me.

c-0: ^Well sure you do, I'm the Technologist of the crew of course.
^I've done some exploring and found some -Aetheric Circuit Fragments- laying around.
^It seems like the harpies in the forest drop them.
^If you bring me some of those fragments I can make something I think you will really like.
^I heard some screaming in the forest ahead, you may want to check it out.
^Anyway, I guess I should go set up my tent on the other island. Ill be there if you need me don't forget about those Fragments.
